item.title: 阿波罗的私人信贷 ETF 有多 "私人"？
item.description:
该公司正与道富联手拟成立基金

。【原文：

The firm is teaming up with State Street on the proposed fund

】

item.title: 巴西从马斯克公司撤资 330 万美元
item.description: 巴西从埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司和 Starlink 公司的银行账户中提取了 1835 万雷亚尔（约合 330 万美元），用于支付最高法院的罚款。【原文：Brazil withdrew 18.35 million reais ($3.3 million) from the bank accounts of Elon Musk’s X and Starlink to pay for fines imposed by the Supreme Court, continuing a dispute that’s led to the blackout of the billionaire’s social-media service in the country.】

item.title: 生物技术公司首次公开募股交易规模扩大后股价攀升
item.description: 三家生物技术公司在各自首次公开募股中售出的股票数量都超过了计划，因此它们的股价在上市后的第一个交易日都出现了上涨。【原文：A trio of biotech companies’ shares rose in their first trading sessions after they each sold more shares in their respective initial public offerings than they had planned.】

item.title: 巴西在利率决议前上调国内生产总值和通胀率预测
item.description: 巴西政府在央行召开重要会议前几天上调了 2024 年的经济增长和通货膨胀预期。【原文：Brazil’s government raised its 2024 growth and inflation forecasts days ahead of a key central bank meeting.】

item.title: 投资者正被邀请加入 Castlelake Abra 融资项目
item.description: BCP Securities 一直在收集投资者对参与融资的兴趣，以帮助支持陷入困境的巴西航空公司 Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 的最大股东。【原文：BCP Securities has been gauging investor interest about participating in financing to help support troubled Brazilian airline Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA’s largest shareholder.】

item.title: 印度官员反驳美国裁定 Byju 单位破产
item.description: 根据周四提交的法庭文件，美国一家法院裁定将批准债权人的请求，将与陷入困境的印度教育技术公司 Byju's 相关联的几个单位置于破产境地。【原文：A US court ruled that it will grant creditors’ request to put several units tied to struggling Indian education technology company Byju’s into bankruptcy, according to court papers filed on Thursday.】

item.title: Orcel 的德国商业银行之举引发对欧洲银行合并的关注
item.description: 本周，Andrea Orcel 的交易诀窍得到了充分展示，他收购德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）部分甚至全部股份的举动令金融界大吃一惊。【原文：Andrea Orcel’s knack for dealmaking was on full display this week when he caught the world of finance by surprise with a move to buy some and possibly all of Commerzbank AG.】

item.title: 欧盟计划于 9 月 25 日投票决定是否提高对中国电动汽车的关税
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，欧盟计划于 9 月 25 日就对从中国进口的电动汽车征收明确关税一事进行投票表决。【原文：The European Union is aiming to hold a vote on introducing definitive tariffs on electric vehicles imported from China on Sept. 25, according to people familiar with the plan.】

item.title: PlayStation 5 Pro 展示了视频游戏图形竞赛的无用性
item.description:
说一款现代游戏拥有 "出色的图形 "已经变得多余，就像 20 世纪 90 年代或 21 世纪初的每个人一样。【原文：

It’s become redundant to say that a modern game has “great graphics,” the way everyone did in the 1990s or early 2000s. These days, they all do.

】

item.title: 印度取消巴斯马蒂大米出口底价以提高吸引力
item.description: 世界上最大的大米出口国印度取消了巴斯马蒂大米的最低出货价格，以提高这一优质品种在全球市场上的竞争力。【原文：India, the world’s biggest exporter of rice, removed the floor price for basmati shipments to boost the premium variety’s competitiveness in the global market.】

item.title: CFTC 寻求阻止卡尔希，美国大选投注再次搁浅
item.description: 美国人想在联邦监管的衍生品交易所对 2024 年的选举结果下注，但再次遇到了障碍。【原文：Americans seeking to bet on the outcome of the 2024 elections on a federally regulated derivatives exchange have again hit a roadblock.】

item.title: 罢工影响生产，波音面临被降至垃圾级的风险
item.description: 波音公司面临着失去投资级信用评级的风险，因为这家陷入困境的飞机制造商面临着工人长期罢工的前景，这将进一步扰乱生产和现金流。【原文：Boeing Co. is at risk of losing its investment-grade credit rating as the embattled planemaker faces the prospect of a drawn-out strike by workers that will further disrupt production and cash flow.】

item.title: 随着需求增长，孟加拉国计划增加液化天然气货物采购量
item.description: 孟加拉国希望在今年增加液化天然气的采购量，在因飓风而暂停三个多月后，其终端已准备好向国家电网供应液化天然气。【原文：Bangladesh is looking to increase purchases of liquefied natural gas this year, with its terminal ready to supply the national grid after a cyclone-related suspension of more than three months.】

item.title: 泰晤士水务聘请重组专家恢复信用评级
item.description: 负债累累的泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Utilities Ltd.）聘请了一位重组专家进入董事会，以避免英国监管机构可能开出的巨额罚单，并恢复其信用评级。【原文：Heavily indebted Thames Water Utilities Ltd. hired a restructuring expert to its board in a bid to avoid potentially hefty fines from the UK regulator and restore its credit rating.】

item.title: 欧盟财政部长避开布达佩斯后，匈牙利谴责抵制行为
item.description: 在匈牙利首都举行的一次财政负责人会议上，主要参与者都避而远之，会后匈牙利加倍抨击欧盟。【原文：Hungary doubled down on its vitriol against the European Union after a meeting of finance chiefs in its capital that saw major players stay away.】

item.title: 奇货通讯：特朗普、贸易和美元供应链
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 日元升至今年最强劲水平，因美联储减息预期升温
item.description: 日元对美元汇率达到今年以来的最高水平，因为市场押注日本货币当局将在今年进一步收紧政策，同时市场为美联储下周的降息预期做好准备。【原文：The yen reached the highest level this year versus the dollar amid bets that Japanese monetary authorities will deliver further policy tightening this year, while markets braced for an expected interest-rate cut from the Federal Reserve next week.】

item.title: 银行持有的小额债券因税制变化降至九年新低
item.description: 美国银行对州和地方债务的投资创下了近九年来的最低水平，原因是应税市政证券的销售下降，贷款机构继续从较低的企业税率中获益。【原文：US banks’ investment in state and local debt is at the lowest level in nearly nine years, as sales of taxable municipal securities have dropped and lending institutions continue to reap the benefits of a lower corporate tax rate.】

item.title: 金属价格回升，南非铂金矿商大涨
item.description: 南非铂金矿商的股价周五大涨，原因是其生产的主要金属价格延续了近期的回升势头。【原文：South African platinum miners’ shares surged on Friday as prices of the main metals they produce extend a recent recovery.】

item.title: Vista、Blackstone 为 Smartsheet 寻求 32 亿美元私募债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Vista Equity Partners 和 Blackstone Inc. 正要求私人信贷机构提供 32 亿美元的一揽子债务，以支持他们对软件制造商 Smartsheet Inc.【原文：Vista Equity Partners and Blackstone Inc. are asking private credit lenders for a $3.2 billion debt package to support their proposed acquisition of software maker Smartsheet Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度证券监管机构裁定 NSE 在不公平市场准入案中胜诉
item.description: 印度证券交易委员会在市场监管机构网站上公布的一项命令显示，在一起可追溯到近十年前的不公平市场准入案件中，印度证券交易委员会没有发现印度国家证券交易所有限公司与 OPG Securities Pvt.【原文：The Securities and Exchange Board of India found no evidence of collusion between the National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. and OPG Securities Pvt. in a case of unfair market access dating back nearly a decade, according to an order published on the market regulator’s website.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司被认为规模太小，无法应对欧盟对大科技公司的打击
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 将避免受到旨在约束科技巨头的具有里程碑意义的欧盟法律的打击，因为监管机构认为该平台对欧盟市场的影响太小。【原文：Elon Musk’s social media platform X is set to avoid being hit by a landmark European Union law aimed at reining in tech giants after watchdogs decided the platform’s impact on EU markets is too small.】

item.title: Ecopetrol 和巴西国家石油公司被勒令停止钻探海上天然气井
item.description: 在一个土著社区寻求法律保护后，哥伦比亚法官命令 Ecopetrol SA 和 Petroleo Brasileiro SA 停止在该国加勒比海水域钻探天然气井。【原文：A Colombian judge ordered Ecopetrol SA and Petroleo Brasileiro SA to halt the drilling of a gas well in the nation’s Caribbean waters after an Indigenous community sought legal protection.】

item.title: 据说战神公司与普洛斯资本合伙公司的交易谈判已进入后期阶段
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp）正在就收购普洛斯资本（GLP Capital Partners Ltd.）在中国以外的业务进行深入谈判，这可能是另类资产管理行业近期最大的合并案之一。【原文：Ares Management Corp. is in advanced talks on an acquisition of GLP Capital Partners Ltd.’s operations outside of China, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could rank as one of the biggest recent combinations in the alternative asset management industry.】

item.title: 马斯克的 "星链 "公司正在与南非商谈推出服务事宜
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链（Starlink）公司正在与南非政府举行会谈，以便在非洲最大、最发达的经济体引入卫星服务。【原文：Elon Musk’s Starlink is holding talks with the South African government to introduce the satellite service in Africa’s biggest and most developed economy, President Cyril Ramaphosa said.】

item.title: 安联全球投资买入英国债券，押注经济面临更严重的放缓
item.description: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司之一安联全球投资公司（Allianz Global Investors）正在购买英国国债，因为该公司认为，随着经济失去动力，英国央行可能会加快降息步伐。【原文：Allianz Global Investors, one of Europe’s biggest asset managers, is buying UK government bonds on the view the Bank of England may step up the pace of interest-rate cuts as the economy loses momentum.】

item.title: 云计算公司 CoreWeave 正在洽谈以 230 亿美元估值出售股份事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，人工智能领域最炙手可热的初创公司之一、云计算供应商 CoreWeave 正在洽谈安排出售现有股份，其估值为 230 亿美元。【原文：CoreWeave, a cloud computing provider that’s among the hottest startups in the artificial intelligence race, is in talks to arrange a sale of existing shares valuing it at $23 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 荷兰威胁驱逐出境，作为新庇护危机法的一部分
item.description: 荷兰政府承诺加强边境管制，并威胁要驱逐出境，同时公布了该国有史以来最严格的移民政策。【原文：The Dutch government promised to strengthen border controls and threatened deportations as it unveiled what it said were the country’s strictest ever migration policies.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行称，由于实际利率高企，塞地已做好反弹准备
item.description: 在高利率、政府财政前景改善和黄金收益的帮助下，加纳的塞地兑美元汇率在创下新低后，反弹的时机似乎已经成熟。【原文：Ghana’s cedi looks ripe for a rebound after hitting a new low against the dollar, helped by high interest rates, a better outlook for government finances and earnings from gold.】

item.title: 惠誉称巴西的投资评级将进一步 "下滑
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）认为，巴西政府需要实现其财政目标，将政府债务稳定在当前水平，并建立财政信誉，然后才能获得信用评级升级。【原文：Brazil’s government would need to hit its fiscal targets, stabilize government debt around current levels and build fiscal credibility before it can score a credit score upgrade, according to Fitch Ratings.】
